attributes.additional_details: People can sometimes get stressed at work and need more time to unwind and relieve stress an additional day in the weekend would help people achieve this
attributes.background: Have a 4 days of working and 3 days on the weekend

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the days people work are a matter for individuals and their employers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
